values:
i miss my niece, abby. she brings so much joy to me when i dont feal good, or when i am lonely. when we picked her up from day care 2day, she almost didnt want to come. im glad she has a happy place to stay, but i wanted to spend time with her. she turned 2 last saturday and she is really smart. she can say her pledge, her abc's, and count to 10! she is so sweet.

i really cant wait for band camp to start. this year i am a tigerette and i have always wanted to be one. both my sisters were and sometimes i wanna be just like them. becky is so smart and works hard at everything. i dont always get along with beck, but i love her as she is! beth is one of a kind! i always get along with her, i love goin shoppin with her and bein with her. i look up to my sister so much and admire them for everything they do.

i plan to go to visionland on sat with all my friends and i cant wait. i look at it as a reunion. we havent seen each other all summer as a whole. i am really excited about that. i go and register for school on thursday and i plan to ask them to spend the night w/ me so i am really excited about that 2!

friday- my best friend, elisabeth spent the night. we had such a great time! we slept out under out carport thing and talked. i think it was great thing, b/c we havent got to see each other as much as we had been hopin for the summer. i enjoyed myself! we had an unexpected surprise! (which was very wonderful)

i have been talkin to this guy and i never thought anyone could be that easy to talk to. im not lookin for a relationship, it is jus good to have some one to talk to. i am always s thrilled when he calls. he puts a little something else in my day when i talk to him.

saturday- liz left, but i didnt sleep well, im glad i didnt sleep though, bc i was talkin to "him" until 5 this mornin. he tells me how he races and how he won his last race. that made me happy for him. he is racin right now. i am growing impatient waitin for his call. maybe i wont be like this much longer

my summer is goin so fast! all my friends are doin their thing and i dont get to see them very much, and thats sad. like they are all doin stuff together and i could go but i always have plans. i have bible school at my church this week and it is realy fun. the little kids are so funny and MESSY! but thats ok cause that mean ryan can stay and help clean up too and that means more time with him. ryan is so good to me and i dont know what i would do without him! i guess i dont realize some of the time how sweet he is to me. my summer readin is comin really slow. my mom is takin me to the school and im gettin notes on them!!! haha im still readin them though... sorta
